backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing content items with admin‑guarded CRUD operations and map‑based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing authorization‑related requirements and associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based styles defining light/dark theme variables and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry loading main.authz.tsx with critical inline CSS for dark background on initial render.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration with layout, public routes, and protected/admin routes using multiple guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterMod: Registration modal handling user input, validation, and localStorage‑backed register workflow.
frontend/src/components/content/AdminCon: Form component allowing admins to add content via Drive links, video uploads, document uploads, or live embeds, with validation and progress handling.
Displays a list of content items with type icons, status toggling, and delete confirmation, including a responsive table layout.
frontend/src/components/content/DriveVid: Converts and embeds Google Drive video links, falling back to an error message with a direct link if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/content/LiveEmbe: Renders an iframe preview of a live embed URL and shows an error state with a fallback link if the site blocks embedding.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Them: Shows a diagnostics banner when enabled via URL param, checking CSS loading, theme variables, and background color.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass‑style card component with optional hover animations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout that applies background styling, shows the navbar based on session state, and wraps page content.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedR: Simple wrapper that applies a fade‑in animation to route content.
frontend/src/components/motion/BabyComed: Displays a playful animated baby-themed visual sequence for the login screen.
frontend/src/components/nav/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with role-based access control, dropdown menus, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/PremiumCard.tsx: Premium glass card with icon, title, optional description, and hover effects for dashboard items.
frontend/src/components/routing/AdminRou: Route guard preventing access to child components unless the user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/routing/Protecte: Guards routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to login and records page visits for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/routing/SectionR: Checks authentication and per-page access, redirecting unauthorized users while allowing admins full access.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Status badge component showing approved or pending states with simple animations.
frontend/src/firebase.ts: Empty placeholder file for Firebase configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessApprovals.ts: Empty placeholder hook for access approvals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthzState.tsx: Provides in-memory auth state, role checks, and page-access logic via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentLibrary.ts: Empty placeholder hook for content library behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, identity loading, login, and logout through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend content operations in React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting content.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Compatibility wrapper exposing session-like data from the new authz state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines the app’s Tailwind-based dark theme, neon accents, animations, and UI utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge Tailwind classes using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.authz.tsx: Bootstraps the app with Internet Identity, React Query, and Authz providers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing users, permissions, analytics, and content via various UI components and hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Dashboard page showing user info and navigation cards based on role and allowed pages.
frontend/src/pages/IntelusPage.tsx: Displays Intelus videos and documents fetched from content items with loading and animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Renders live embed content from fetched items with loading state and fallback when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login, validation, state setting, return-to redirects, and optional register modal.
frontend/src/pages/MyFilesPage.tsx: Shows a list of document items with open-file actions and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MyVideosPage.tsx: Displays video items (links or files) with embeds, metadata, and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Embeds an external portfolio page inside a styled iframe container.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Instantly redirects to the login page while preserving return-to parameters.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders a videos page displaying embedded YouTube videos using animated cards and layout components.
frontend/src/utils/accessApprovals.ts: Empty placeholder utility file for access approval logic.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: LocalStorage-backed analytics system for tracking logins, page visits, and emitting update events.
frontend/src/utils/auth.ts: Handles user registration, admin approval, and permission updates using localStorage-backed user data.
frontend/src/utils/contentLibrary.ts: Empty placeholder for content library utilities.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates video and document file types and sizes and provides file-size formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/googleDriveEmbed.ts: Parses Google Drive URLs to extract file IDs and generate embeddable preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/motion.ts: Defines shared motion constants and CSS animation class mappings for UI animations.
frontend/src/utils/returnTo.ts: Manages storing and retrieving return-to paths for login redirection using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/seed.ts: Seeds a default admin user into localStorage if not already present.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides localStorage-based user management utilities and deprecated session helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, environment variable support, aliases, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for moving the app to a Firestore-driven authorization model. Serves as a high-level specification and issue tracker for required fixes and behavior changes.
